Title: Arbitrary Code Execution
Description: Due to a missing file extension in the `fileDenyPattern`, backend user are allowed to upload *.pht files which can be executed in certain web server setups.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 7.6.0 before 7.6.22, all versions starting from 8.0.0 before 8.7.5
NotImpacted: All versions before 7.6.0, all versions starting from 7.6.22 before 8.0.0, all versions starting from 8.7.5
Solution: Upgrade to versions v7.6.22, v8.7.5 or above.
